name: Time Flies
description:
Time Flies is a vertical scrolling shoot 'em up where the player flies a spaceship over a terrain, shooting at airborne and ground targets.
An evil time lord has stolen 24 hours of time itself and hidden on four planets. The objective is to recover the lost time by fighting your way through the planetary defences.
